lever.additional:
GoPay is the payments vertical of Gojek, which enables customers to make digital payments for any of the Gojek services, offline payment needs or third-party e-commerce sites. The mission of GoPay is to move customers from physical cash payments to digital cash payments. Overall it’s an ecosystem consisting of consumers and merchants which GoPay manages with the ultimate aim of providing best user experience to consumers and growth for merchants.

Gojek is an equal opportunity workplace that is committed to diversity and inclusion. At Gojek we celebrate our differences, because we believe that diversity not only creates a healthier work environment for our employees, but also helps our business thrive. 



About us

Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!
lever.description:
GoPay is Southeast Asia’s fastest-growing consumer payments and financial services startup. We currently have a team of 100+ engineers across 3 locations - Bangalore, Jakarta and Singapore. GoPay services more than 8 million unique users every day on a variety of payment avenues, providing the most convenient payment method in Indonesia. 

We are looking for highly driven, talented and self-motivated Leader to join a team of world-class engineers. QA Leader would need to lead and implement the test strategy for automation as well as manual by working closely with the product engineering group. They would also work on the latest cutting-edge internet/software technology. As Gojek is expanding rapidly, we are looking for highly driven, talented and self-motivated Engineers to help us tackle engineering challenges that come with it.

lists.content:
• Own the overall quality of the product and feature being released to production
  • Define and design the testing strategy of overall Gopay
  • Lead and guide QA managers / leads of smaller QA teams functioning in different feature teams of the organisation
  • Responsible for planning and getting implemented the Test Automation strategy across all layers of the product which should include UI, Integration and Unit Testing
  • Participate in all the interviews, training and evaluation sessions of QA Leads
  • Mentoring the QA Leads in leadership and management skills
  • Have the onus of analysing the team processes and proposing new ideas to improvise the existing process which best suits the team and product quality
  • Act as a bridge between the QA function and other stakeholders, leaders of different functions and discuss team’s and technical issues
  • Define and set standards for various testing processes like Test Case Creation, Bug Reporting Mechanism, Coding Practices in Automation
  • Ensuring the development and product team adheres to different practices and guidelines as defined by the Testing Strategy
  • Responsible for collecting, analyzing and creating reports on different data and metrics related to testing, bugs and automation coverage
  • Analyse the tools and technologies being used by the QA Team to perform manual and automation testing. Encourage team members to learn and use the latest technologies.
  • Manage training and continuous learning of QA staff by means of short courses, conferences, meetups, certifications, etc.
  • Act as the primary point of contact for all the discussions related to the QA Team
  • Guide the QA Teams technically in following the testing methodologies, automation techniques and processes
  • Ensuring the proper documentation of all the testing activities being conducted by the team which should become the knowledge base for new joinees
  • Responsible for smooth onboarding of the new QA within any stream across the organisation
  • Provide regular feedback to the QA Leads and the QA Team on all aspects of the quality
  • Keep a check on the infrastructure requirements for the QA Team, including the test environment, test devices, cloud services for test devices, and make sure that the QA Team is equipped with sufficient infrastructure.

• 12+ years of experience in the software testing domain with excellent leadership skills
  • Should have the experience of leading and managing a number of smaller QA teams in parallel
  • Experience of owning, designing, defining, developing and implementing different testing and quality standards in the past
  • Should have technical expertise in guiding the development and QA teams in building and maintaining the processes and tools which ensure the quality of the product
  • Working knowledge of measuring different metrics and creating reports and dashboards
  • Working knowledge of sprint planning and backlog management in JIRA and Confluence
  • Working knowledge of CI/CD, and how QA should be implemented in automated release
  • Should have good interpersonal, communication, and collaboration skills
  • Must have working knowledge of different testing technologies, methodologies, and automation tools
